rules.description: Use LEFT OPTION + s to search copied word in Dictionary.app
Hyper Key: Tab (held down) → left control + left command (⌃⌘)
Double-tap left command key → caps lock toggle

manipulators.description: shift + option + j = mouse left fast
shift + control + j = mouse wheel left
shift + command + j = mouse wheel left fast
shift + option + k = mouse down fast
shift + control + k = mouse wheel down
shift + option + i = mouse up fast
shift + control + i = mouse wheel up
shift + command + i = mouse wheel up fast
shift + option + l = mouse move right fast
shift + control + l = mouse wheel right
shift + command + l = mouse wheel right fast
shift + control + u = mouse wheel left (rev)
shift + command + u = mouse wheel left (rev) fast
shift + option + i = mouse move down fast
shift + control + i = mouse wheel down (rev)
shift + command + i = mouse wheel down (rev) fast
shift + control + o = mouse wheel up (rev)
shift + command + o = mouse wheel up (rev) fast
shift + control + p = mouse wheel right (rev)
shift + command + p = mouse wheel right (rev) fast
control + shift + enter = button1 (mouse left click)
shift + up arrow = mouse wheel up
shift + option + up arrow = mouse wheel up slow
shift + option + k = mouse wheel down slow
shift + option + j = mouse wheel left slow
shift + option + l = mouse wheel right slow
shift + command + up arrow = mouse wheel up fast
shift + command + k = mouse wheel down fast
shift + command + j = mouse wheel left fast
shift + command + l = mouse wheel right fast
option + up arrow = mouse up slow
command + up arrow = mouse up fast
Menu click equal to ESC press equal to hyper
